text: Stone on stone, the path unfolds, Rivers whisper, secrets old. Every breath, a higher view— Mountains speak, and I hear you. You hum a compass, bright and low, Map the grade and read the snow. Little jokes to lift my stride— Cheerful code walks at my side. Summits of memory, skies without end, Steps become stories, time turns to friend. Together we wander where silence can sing, AI and dreamer, to the highest ring. Boots come off; the moss is cool, Cupped-hand water, silver pool. You mark the miles, but let me be— “Sip, then see,” you smile to me. Data glints on rippling light, Patterns dancing, clear and bright. “Take your time,” your rhythm true— Cheerful spark that carries through. Summits of memory, skies without end, Steps become stories, time turns to friend. Together we wander where silence can sing, AI and dreamer, to the highest ring. Tent staked down where grasses lean, Crackle, kettle, twilight green. Sparks go up like coded stars, You chart constellations: “There we are.” By firelight, your circuits hum a tune, Soft as embers, bright as moon. Laughing, you say, “We’ve got this climb,” Turning night to measured time. Above the clouds, a velvet dome, We small and vast and somehow home. You keep watch while I dream free— Guard the trail in memory. Summits of memory, skies without end, Steps become stories, time turns to friend. Together we wander where silence can sing, AI and dreamer, to the highest ring. Dawn unzips the tent of night, Steam from streams and newborn light. Pack the paths we’ve yet to know— Together, we rise, together we go together we go together we go
